page.title: 07MARKETING
page.content: Many of the crops grown in the area are still sold through traditional merchant outlets. However during the last decade more grower owned co-operative marketing organisations have been formed. As with the farms themselves wholesale outlets have grown in size and reduced in numbers. The demand for guaranteed continuity of quality and quantity have far exceeded the ability of any one farmer to meet , so it has been to growers advantage to join a group. {Market support}exists for some crops grown in the area. This is an attempt to regulate crop acres and avoid the peaks and troughsof production. Examples of support are the intervention buying of cereals and cauliflowers be the E.E.C.
